item.title: Shilchar Technologies Ltd Falls 11.60%: 2 Key Factors Driving the Sharp Decline

item.title: Bosch Ltd Falls 3.74%: 4 Key Factors Driving the Weekly Decline
item.description: Bosch Ltd’s stock declined by 3.74% over the week ending 9 January 2026, underperforming the Sensex which fell 2.62%. The week was marked by a sharp surge in derivatives open interest amid mixed market signals, a shift to a mildly bullish technical momentum, and a notable valuation re-rating to expensive territory. Despite strong historical returns and technical resilience, the stock faced selling pressure in the latter half of the week, reflecting cautious investor sentiment amid broader market weakness. item.title: Navkar Urbanstructure Ltd Falls 3.95%: 5 Key Factors Behind the Volatile Week
item.description: Navkar Urbanstructure Ltd experienced a volatile week from 5 to 9 January 2026, closing down 3.95% at Rs.1.70 despite early strong gains. The stock initially surged with three consecutive upper circuit hits, outperforming the Sensex which declined 2.62% over the same period. However, heavy selling pressure on the last two trading days triggered lower circuit limits, erasing much of the week's earlier gains and signalling heightened investor caution amid mixed technical and fundamental signals. Time: 1 hour ago
